column4: strangest thing... i did 'ifconfig eth0 down' and things started to speed up!?
aaaaah... it's detecting some wireless connection
but still... i'd like to have my speedy cable connection
can someone help me get the cable connection to work?
ipw2100: Detected Intel PRO/Wireless 2100 Network Connection
i think it had to do with the simple command i put in yesterday
what tipe is your wireless card
ipw2100: Detected Intel PRO/Wireless 2100 Network Connection
but what you use to make it work?
it was automatically configured for me
